Author: Gisela Torres
Summary: It shutdowns/starts ASM virtual machines by Cloud Service in parallel.It has two parameters: the service name and the action you want to perform (shutdown (true) or start (false) your VMs).You have to create a Credential Asset with the name DefaultAzureCredential in order to acce
Title: Shutdown/Start ASM VMs by Cloud Service in parallel
UserTags: Utility, Windows Azure Virtual Machines, Azure Automation
